Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Northbound Reroute near Harlem/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand then resume their normal route on Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand  then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball/Homan Temporary Reroute near  Lawndale/25th
ShortDescription: #82 Kimball/Homan buses temp. rerouted NB buses will continue on Central Park, 31st, SB buses will operate via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale, 32nd, Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Lawndale/25th.

Northbound buses will continue on Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale, 32nd, Central Park, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
